com.ooad.hw1.engine.x2Multiplier
public class x2Multiplier extends PowerUpDecorator
A-Type Power Up x2Multiplier decorator class extends PowerUpDecorator. It's multiplier set to 2

    • calculateMultiplier

      public long calculateMultiplier()
      Description copied from class: PowerUp
      To calculate multiplied powerUps, i used decorator design pattern. Every decorator objects has decorator object that is collected before it. So, it does recursively multiply decorators multipliers.
      Specified by:
      calculateMultiplier in class PowerUp
      Returns:
      current multiplier

    • CollisionAction

      protected void CollisionAction(Character character)
      Description copied from class: Collidable
      When collision happens there must be some actions to take on. Implement this method to do what function you want to enable on Character object
      Specified by:
      CollisionAction in class Collidable
      Parameters:
      character - object that collided with this current object.
